00022 
00023 #ifdef _DBG_WITH_SYS_
00024 #include <sys.h>
00025 #define TRACE 0 /* unused with _DBG_WITH_SYS, but necessary */
00026 
00027 #define DBG_printf0(a,b) SYS_printf(b)
00028 #define DBG_printf1(a,b,c) SYS_printf(b,c)
00029 #define DBG_printf2(a,b,c,d) SYS_printf(b,c,d)
00030 
00031 #else /* ! _DBG_WITH_SYS_ */

00037 #define DBG_printf1(a,b,c) LOG_printf(a,b,c)
00038 #define DBG_printf2(a,b,c,d) LOG_printf(a,b,c,d)

00040 #endif
